title: Moon to Dust
creator_contributor_role: Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Change (Psychology)
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Separation (Psychology)
abstract: A beautiful combination of hand-drawn and computer animation in this story of a boy and his journey to find his home.
description: Winner of 'Best Character Animation' for RMIT's AIM Graduate Screenings, 2009. Set to the song of the same name by Georgia Fields, 'Moon to Dust' is a beautiful and melancholic rendering of belonging, isolation and change.
